page.title: 04Housing
page.content:
As stated on page 1, housing in N.W. Kilmarnock is of two types:
(1) Rented accommodation provided by Kilmarnock and Loudoun District Council, subsidised by Rates based on the Assessed Rental of all properties. (Onthank_ 1,450 : Altonhill_340)
(2) Privately owned houses,detached and semi-detached, built individually and in housing estates.
Council Houses which had been abused and were in a state of disrepair, having been sold to a firm of house-builders, are being restored, modernised and sold to private owners.
